import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { ProfileDetails } from 'src/app/types/user'; @Component({ selector: 'app-profile', templateUrl: './profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./profile.component.css'] }) export class ProfileComponent { showEditMode: boolean = false; profileDetails: ProfileDetails = { username: 'pesho', email: 'pesho@gmail.com', tel: '0899956956' } form = this.fb.group({ username: ['', [Validators.required, ]], email: [''], tel: [''], }) constructor(private fb: FormBuilder) {} onEdit(): void { this.showEditMode = true; } }
